sentence.Network_en: Oersted's experiment was the first evidence that current - carrying wires produce magnetic effects.
sentence.Network_cn: 奥斯忒的实验是通 电流导线 产生磁效应的第一个证据.

sentence.Network_en: Oersted demonstrated that electric currents could produce magnetic effects.
sentence.Network_cn: 奥斯忒表演了电流能引起磁效应.

sentence.Network_en: A unit of magnetic field strength equal to one hundred thousandth ( 10 - 5 ) of an oersted.
